name: 劉傳銘
objective: 本科目所探討的內容包括: 1. 集合與命題, 2. 計數、排列與組合, 3. 關聯與函式, 4. 基礎圖論,  5.樹狀結構, 6. 有限狀態機, 7. 演算法分析介紹, 8.生程函數, 9. 遞迴式10.群, 11. 布林幾何。
schedule:
Foundations: Sets, Logic, and Algorithms 
Integers and Mathematical Induction 
Relations and Posets 
Matrices and Closures of Relations 
Functions 
Counting Principles 
Recurrence Relations 
Algorithms and Time Complexity 
Graph Theory 
Trees and Networks 
Boolean Algebra and Combinatorial Circuits 
Congruences 
Finite Automata and Languages
materials:
Textbook: 
*D.S. Malik and M. K. Sen, Discrete Mathematical Structures: Theory and Applications, Thomson Learning, 2004. ISBN-13: 978-0-619-21558-3.

References 
*Ralph P. Grimaldi, Discrete and Combinatorial Mathematics - An Applied Introduction, 5th ed., Pearson/Addison Wesley, 2004. (International Edition) . ISBN:0-321-21103-0. 
*Judith L. Gersting, Mathematical Structures for Computer Science - A Modern Approach to Discrete Mathematics, 6th ed., W. H. Freeman and Company New York, 2007. ISBN-13:978-0-7167-684-X.
